dynamic.isNotNull: exists(select 1 from Tb_spfl as spfl where spfl.id = #id_spfl# and fl.path+'/' like spfl.path+'/%' )
exists(select 1 from tb_sp sp where db.id_sp=sp.id and (sp.mc like #keyword# or db.bm_Interface like #keyword# OR sku.barcode LIKE #keyword# or sku.keywords like #keyword# ))

not exists (select 1 from tb_sp_sku_push where db.[id_sku]=id_sku and id_gys_push = #id_gys# and falg_state=0) and not exists (select 1 from tb_sp_sku_fd where db.[id_sku] = id_sku and id_gys_fd = #id_gys#)

statements.sql: set transaction isolation level read uncommitted
statements.delete: set nocount on delete db from as db
statements.update: set nocount on update db from as db left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl
statements.select:
set nocount on
select db.[id_gys],db.[id_sku],db.[id_sp],db.[flag_stop],db.[bm_Interface],db.[id_spfl],db.[sort_id],db.[dj_base],db.[zhl],db.[flag_up],db.[sl_kc],db.[sl_kc_bj],db.[id_create],db.[rq_create],db.[id_edit],db.[rq_edit] from as db

set nocount on
select db.[id_sku],db.[id_sp],(case isnull(db.bm_Interface,'') when '' then sku.bm else db.bm_Interface end ) as bm_Interface from as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on db.id_sku=sku.id

set nocount on
select sku.id,db.*,sku.photo_min,sku.photo_min2, (case isnull(db.bm_Interface,'') when '' then sku.bm else db.bm_Interface end) as bm, sku.unit,fl.name as name_fl,sp.mc as name_sp,sp.id_gys_create,
isnull(isnull(spcgs.dj_dh,mdj.dj_dh), db.dj_base) as dj
db.dj_base as dj
from as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku left join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl
left join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys and gc.id_cgs=#id_cgs# left join Tb_sp_dj mdj on mdj.id_gys=db.id_gys and mdj.id_sku =db.id_sku and mdj.id_cgs_level=gc.id_cgs_level LEFT JOIN Tb_sp_cgs spcgs ON db.id_sku=spcgs.id_sku AND spcgs.id_gys=db.id_gys AND spcgs.id_cgs=gc.id_cgs
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0

set nocount on
select sku.id,db.*, (case isnull(db.bm_Interface,'') when '' then sku.bm else db.bm_Interface end) as bm, sku.unit,fl.name as name_fl,sp.mc as name_sp from Tb_gys_sp as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku left join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl where db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0
and db.[id_gys]=#id_gys#

set nocount on
select t.* from (select row_number() over() as rownumber,sku.id,db.*,sku.photo_min,sku.photo_min2, dbo.f_str_empty(db.bm_Interface,sku.bm) as bm, sku.unit,fl.name as name_fl,sp.mc as name_sp,sp.id_gys_create,info.description,sku.barcode,
isnull(isnull(spcgs.dj_dh,mdj.dj_dh), db.dj_base) as dj, mdj.sl_dh_min ,CASE isnull(sc.id_sp,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end flag_Favorites ,CASE isnull(cart.id_sku,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end as gwc ,isnull(cart.sl,0) as gwcsl ,gc.alias_gys
isnull(db.dj_base,0) as dj ,0.0 sl_dh_min ,0 flag_Favorites ,0 gwc ,0.0 gwcsl ,'' alias_gys
from as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join Tb_sp_info info on info.id_sku=db.id_sku
inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs=#id_cgs# left join Tb_sp_dj mdj on mdj.id_gys=db.id_gys and mdj.id_sku =db.id_sku and mdj.id_cgs_level=gc.id_cgs_level LEFT JOIN Tb_sp_cgs spcgs ON db.id_sku=spcgs.id_sku AND spcgs.id_gys=db.id_gys AND spcgs.id_cgs=gc.id_cgs left join Td_sale_cart as cart on cart.id_sku = sku.id and cart.id_gys=gc.id_gys and cart.id_user=#id_user# left join Tb_sp_Favorites as sc on sc.id_sp = sp.id and sc.id_gys=gc.id_gys and sc.id_user=#id_user#
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0
and db.id_sku in #sku[]#
) as t

set nocount on
select count(1) as value from as db left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl

set nocount on
select db.[id_gys],db.[id_sku],db.[id_sp],db.[flag_stop],db.[bm_Interface],db.[id_spfl],db.[sort_id],db.[dj_base],db.[zhl],db.[flag_up],db.[sl_kc],db.[sl_kc_bj],db.[id_create],db.[rq_create],db.[id_edit],db.[rq_edit] from as db

set nocount on
select count(1) as value from as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl
inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs=#id_cgs#
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0

set nocount on
SELECT count(*)as value from ( select 1 a from [Tb_gys_sp]as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs= #id_cgs#
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0
UNION all
SELECT 1 a
from [Tb_gys_sp]as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl inner join (select id,icnt = count(*) from Tb_sp_char where charindex(mc, #keyword# )>0 group by id)b on db.id_sp=b.id inner join (select id,icnt = count(*) from Tb_sp_doublechar where charindex(mc, #keyword# )>0 and datalength(mc)=4 group by id)c on db.id_sp=c.id left join (select id,icnt = count(*) from Tb_sp_threechar where charindex(mc, #keyword#)>0 group by id)d on db.id_sp=d.id inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs= #id_cgs# where 1=1 db.[id_gys]=#id_gys# db.[flag_up]=#flag_up#
exists(select 1 from Tb_spfl as spfl where spfl.id = #id_spfl# and fl.path+'/' like spfl.path+'/%' )
fl.[id]=#spfl_id# and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 from (SELECT sku.id from [Tb_gys_sp]as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs= #id_cgs#
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0)a WHERE a.id=sku.id ) ) as t

set nocount on
SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over ( order by t.nor)rownumber ,t.* from ( select 0 nor,sku.id,db.*,sku.photo_min,sku.photo_min2, dbo.f_str_empty(db.bm_Interface,sku.bm) as bm, sku.unit,fl.name as name_fl,sp.mc as name_sp,sp.id_gys_create, isnull(isnull(spcgs.dj_dh,mdj.dj_dh), db.dj_base) as dj ,mdj.sl_dh_min ,CASE isnull(sc.id_sp,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end flag_Favorites ,CASE isnull(cart.id_sku,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end as gwc , isnull(cart.sl,0) as gwcsl ,gc.alias_gys from [Tb_gys_sp]as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs= #id_cgs# left join Tb_sp_dj mdj on mdj.id_gys=db.id_gys and mdj.id_sku =db.id_sku and mdj.id_cgs_level=gc.id_cgs_level LEFT JOIN Tb_sp_cgs spcgs ON db.id_sku=spcgs.id_sku AND spcgs.id_gys=db.id_gys AND spcgs.id_cgs=gc.id_cgs left join Td_sale_cart as cart on cart.id_sku = sku.id and cart.id_gys=gc.id_gys and cart.id_user=#id_user# left join Tb_sp_Favorites as sc on sc.id_sp = sp.id and sc.id_gys=gc.id_gys and sc.id_user=#id_user#
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0
UNION all
SELECT row_number() over ( order by case when charindex( #keyword# ,sp.mc)>0 then 1 else 2 end, isnull(d.icnt,0) desc, c.icnt desc, b.icnt desc, sp.mc)nor, sku.id,db.*,sku.photo_min,sku.photo_min2, dbo.f_str_empty(db.bm_Interface,sku.bm) as bm, sku.unit,fl.name as name_fl,sp.mc as name_sp,sp.id_gys_create, isnull(isnull(spcgs.dj_dh,mdj.dj_dh), db.dj_base) as dj ,mdj.sl_dh_min ,CASE isnull(sc.id_sp,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end flag_Favorites ,CASE isnull(cart.id_sku,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end as gwc , isnull(cart.sl,0) as gwcsl ,gc.alias_gys
from [Tb_gys_sp]as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl
inner join (select id,icnt = count(*) from Tb_sp_char where charindex(mc, #keyword# )>0 group by id)b on db.id_sp=b.id inner join (select id,icnt = count(*) from Tb_sp_doublechar where charindex(mc, #keyword# )>0 and datalength(mc)=4 group by id)c on db.id_sp=c.id left join (select id,icnt = count(*) from Tb_sp_threechar where charindex(mc, #keyword#)>0 group by id)d on db.id_sp=d.id inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs= #id_cgs# left join Tb_sp_dj mdj on mdj.id_gys=db.id_gys and mdj.id_sku =db.id_sku and mdj.id_cgs_level=gc.id_cgs_level LEFT JOIN Tb_sp_cgs spcgs ON db.id_sku=spcgs.id_sku AND spcgs.id_gys=db.id_gys AND spcgs.id_cgs=gc.id_cgs left join Td_sale_cart as cart on cart.id_sku = sku.id and cart.id_gys=gc.id_gys and cart.id_user=#id_user# left join Tb_sp_Favorites as sc on sc.id_sp = sp.id and sc.id_gys=gc.id_gys and sc.id_user=#id_user# where 1=1 db.[id_gys]=#id_gys# db.[flag_up]=#flag_up#
exists(select 1 from Tb_spfl as spfl where spfl.id = #id_spfl# and fl.path+'/' like spfl.path+'/%' )
fl.[id]=#spfl_id# and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 from (SELECT sku.id from [Tb_gys_sp]as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl
inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs= #id_cgs# left join Tb_sp_dj mdj on mdj.id_gys=db.id_gys and mdj.id_sku =db.id_sku and mdj.id_cgs_level=gc.id_cgs_level LEFT JOIN Tb_sp_cgs spcgs ON db.id_sku=spcgs.id_sku AND spcgs.id_gys=db.id_gys AND spcgs.id_cgs=gc.id_cgs
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0)a WHERE a.id=sku.id ) ) as t )t

set nocount on
select t.* from (select row_number() over() as rownumber,sku.id,db.*,sku.photo_min,sku.photo_min2, dbo.f_str_empty(db.bm_Interface,sku.bm) as bm, sku.unit,fl.name as name_fl,sp.mc as name_sp,sp.id_gys_create,info.description,sku.barcode,
isnull(stuff(( select ','+td.mc+':'+td.val from (select expt.*,temp.mc from [dbo].[Tb_sp_expand] expt left join [dbo].[Tb_sp_expand_template] temp on temp.id=expt.id_sp_expand_template)as td where td.id_sku=db.id_sku for xml path('')),1,1,''),'') as name_spec_zh,
isnull(stuff(( select cast(td.id_sp_expand_template as varchar(10))+'/' from (select expt.*,temp.mc from [dbo].[Tb_sp_expand] expt left join [dbo].[Tb_sp_expand_template] temp on temp.id=expt.id_sp_expand_template)as td where td.id_sku=db.id_sku for xml path('')),1,0,''),'') as name_spec_id,
isnull(stuff(( select td.mc+'，' from (select sptag.[id_tag],sptag.[id_sku],sptag.[id_gys],tag.mc from [dbo].[Tb_gys_sp_tag] sptag left join [dbo].[Tb_gys_tag] tag on tag.id_tag=sptag.id_tag)as td where td.id_gys=db.id_gys and td.id_sku=db.id_sku for xml path('')),1,0,''),'') as sp_tag,
isnull(isnull(spcgs.dj_dh,mdj.dj_dh), db.dj_base) as dj, mdj.sl_dh_min ,CASE isnull(sc.id_sp,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end flag_Favorites ,CASE isnull(cart.id_sku,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 end as gwc ,isnull(cart.sl,0) as gwcsl ,gc.alias_gys
isnull(db.dj_base,0) as dj ,0.0 sl_dh_min ,0 flag_Favorites ,0 gwc ,0.0 gwcsl ,'' alias_gys
from as db left join Tb_sp_sku sku on sku.id=db.id_sku inner join Tb_sp sp on sp.id=sku.id_sp left join Tb_spfl fl on fl.id=db.id_spfl left join Tb_sp_info info on info.id_sku=db.id_sku
inner join Tb_gys_cgs as gc on gc.id_gys = db.id_gys AND gc.flag_stop=0 and gc.id_cgs=#id_cgs# left join Tb_sp_dj mdj on mdj.id_gys=db.id_gys and mdj.id_sku =db.id_sku and mdj.id_cgs_level=gc.id_cgs_level LEFT JOIN Tb_sp_cgs spcgs ON db.id_sku=spcgs.id_sku AND spcgs.id_gys=db.id_gys AND spcgs.id_cgs=gc.id_cgs left join Td_sale_cart as cart on cart.id_sku = sku.id and cart.id_gys=gc.id_gys and cart.id_user=#id_user# left join Tb_sp_Favorites as sc on sc.id_sp = sp.id and sc.id_gys=gc.id_gys and sc.id_user=#id_user#
and db.flag_stop = 0 and sku.flag_stop = 0
and db.id_sku in #sku[]#
) as t
